welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Francisville, where charm meets history! Get ready to experience our beautiful city known for its quaint streets, delicious food, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Francisville has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at CVG serves as the primary hub for all airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A offers a variety of shopping and dining options for passengers, as well as direct access to gates for Delta and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves low-cost carriers and offers a more streamlined and efficient travel experience for budget-conscious travelers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati Municipal-Lunken Field Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
